items.content_html: An administrative client application designed for managing certificates within the Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) framework. This lightweight client provides a streamlined interface for administrators to view, create, revoke, and archive certificates stored in the PKI server backend.
items.title: radepejanvic/PKI-client: An administrative client application designed for managing certificates within the Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) framework. This lightweight client provides a streamlined interface for administrators to view, create, revoke, and archive certificates stored in the PKI server backend.
